modName: Hroki Best Wife and Companion Mod
summary: Marry The most beautiful Gal in the game Hroki! and have her fight hordes of enemys too!
descriptionHtml:
-----UPDATE! March 21st 2012--------------
Added an optional version of Hroki with duel wielding capability and comes readily equipped with \"mind Blades\" kinda like dungeons and dragons class i really enjoyed. These \"mind Blades\" arnt your typical bound weapons so shes a bit overpowered below the level 28 area. :) its WIP either way and may be a little buggy.



----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Inspired By http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3983 , I started From Scratch after a few hours of playing with my new wife companion and there was just a few things I had to change. (mainly the conjured familiar , not very good for sneaking :3)
-------------------------MOD DESCRIPTION------------------------------------------------------------   

  1. Makes Hroki able to be married while the player has an amulet of mara on NO CONSOLE COMMANDS NEEDED :)
2. Makes Hroki able to be used as a follower NO CONSOLE NEEDED
3. Make her randomly naked : / cant be fixed i tried everything within my skill.
4. Shes a 2h specialist, she has quite a nice bow though :3
5. enjoy :)!
--------------------Installation---------------------------------------
Drop the \"Hroki Best Wife and Companion mod.esp\" in your  Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data folder and make sure its checked before you play :D.

--------Plans for future installments ----------------------
~`Some added flavor text
~ Getting her to keep some clothing on :P
~Giving her a house in Markrath 

please leave any buggs in comments so i can quickly fix them :) Thank you!

----- Specail Note--------
For anyone who has used http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3983 <--- this mod you will not be able to use my mod , sadly a bug will show up if you switch to my mod after using that one (something to do with the console commands used most likely : /) where hroki will be forever home and think she is following you :( . (doesn\'t happen every time but 9/10 times it will better safe then sorry)
